verbs.description: [V: slow] [ARG1: cooker enchiladas] as a busy wife and mother of two young sons i rely on this handy recipe i layer enchilada ingredients in the slow cooker turn it on and forget about it with a bit of spice these hearty enchiladas are especially nice during the colder months —mary luebbert benton kansas onemain financial services rda enthusiast brands brenda mexi corn benton kansas debbie gary cook janice
